subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Zach Johnson shot a six-under 65 and birdied three of the last seven holes to finish 16 under to win the BMW Championship, snatching victory from Jim Furyk, who shot a 71 and finished 13 under.
snippet: Zach Johnson shot a six-under 65 and birdied three of the last seven holes to finish 16 under to win the BMW Championship, snatching victory from Jim Furyk, who shot a 71 and finished 13 under.
